cast.overview: When a seemingly straight-forward drug deal goes awry, XXXX has to break his die-hard rules and turn up the heat, not only to outwit the old regime and come out on top, but to save his own skin...
cast.title: Layer Cake

details.biography:
Daniel has appeared in several international B movies in an eclectic career encompassing his love of saxophone, sport and acting.  So far Daniel has appeared as a child star in Hwerow Hweg (see keyhole photo) , Layer Cake (see Van photo) and latterly Dizzy Hits The Bar (2012), Stalingrad (2013) (main photo), Zombie Night (2013), Cesar Chavez (2014 ).

This while pursuing his saxophone stint in Concha Buika's band, appearing on several albums including La Noche Más Larga. Guest slots with Mobo winning Krept & Konan, Headwater, Kid Creole & the Coconuts  &  Icelandic rock band Kaleo just polished the legacy of good work.
details.name: Daniel Moorehead
